sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 15-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Buck Jones, Grant Withers, Marion Shilling
Directed by: Lew Landers

The sheriff of Sun Dog sacrifices his job and his good name to save his best friend from the hangman‚Äôs noose!

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00        PizzaFLIX Intro
1:02        CHAPTER 1:  Sentenced to Die
21:42      CHAPTER 2:  A Leap for Life
42:43      CHAPTER 3:  The Night Attack
1:03:59   CHAPTER 4:  A Treacherous Ambush
1:21:19   CHAPTER 5:  Trapped
1:41:44   CHAPTER 6:  The Brink of Death
2:00:51   CHAPTER 7:  The Fatal Plunge
2:19:04   CHAPTER 8:  The Stampede
2:36:15   CHAPTER 9:  The Posse Rides
2:53:20   CHAPTER 10:  The Avenging Trail
3:11:14   CHAPTER 11:  The Lost Diamonds
3:29:49   CHAPTER 12:  Double Trouble
3:47:34   CHAPTER 13:  The Night Raiders
4:06:15   CHAPTER 14:  In the Enemies' Hideout
4:24:02   CHAPTER 15:  Brought to Justice
4:42:06 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: 'Red' Davidson (Buck Jones), the sheriff of Sun Dog, sacrifices his job and his good name to save his best friend, 'Silent' Slade from the hangman's noose, following a framed-up court decision which sentences Slade to hang for the murder of Scotty McKee (J.P. McGowan). Davidson allows Slade to escape from jail and follows him to aid him in proving his innocence.
metadata.Writer: W.C. Tuttle, George H. Plympton, Vin Moore
metadata.Actors: Buck Jones, Grant Withers, Marion Shilling
